Project.Brief history of your project and organi: I'm Corona. I am a scholar and data preparer. I want to store these public search data in Filecoin. This helps me with my research. The processing of SARS-CoV-2 Sequence Read Archive (SRA) files has been optimized to identify genetic variations in viral samples. This information is then presented in the Variant Call Format (VCF). Each VCF file corresponds to the SRA parent-run's accession ID. Additionally, the data is available in the parquet format, making it easier to search and filter using the Amazon Athena Service.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: This repository within the ACTIV TRACE initiative houses a comprehensive collection of datasets related to SARS-CoV-2.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: Use our own tool and Lotus to create car files.------make the covid-19 data into car files. sps help store it into filecoin.
